                )

        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='||',
              left=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='&&',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case1',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='0',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case2',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='0',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='abs',
                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                BinaryOp(
                                  op='-',
                                  left=
                                    ArrayRef(
                                      name=
                                        ID(
                                          name='case1',
                                        )
                                      subscript=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='1',
                                        )
                                    )
                                  right=
                                    ArrayRef(
                                      name=
                                        ID(
                                          name='case2',
                                        )
                                      subscript=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='1',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                )
              right=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='&&',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case1',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case2',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='-',
                          left=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='case1',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='0',
                                )
                            )
                          right=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='case2',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                Constant(

                                  value='0',
                                )

                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
